title: QSR chain Charcoal Eats gets ₹45 crore on its plate
description: The nine-year-old company has 40 doors, mostly cloud kitchens in Mumbai, Pune and Delhi-NCR and competes with Biryani by Kilo and Behrouz Biryani in the ₹6,000 crore biryani segment. For the past several years, biryani has been the most ordered dish on both Swiggy and Zomato, but the market is highly fragmented and unorganised.
